abstract: John T. Gilbride was the former head of Todd Shipyards Corporation, once the largest independent shipbuilding company in the country.
snippet: John T. Gilbride was the former head of Todd Shipyards Corporation, once the largest independent shipbuilding company in the country.
lead_paragraph: John T. Gilbride, a former chairman and chief executive of the Todd Shipyards Corporation, once the largest independent shipbuilding company in the country, died on March 17 at his home in Stamford, Conn. He was 90.

headline.main: John T. Gilbride, 90, Former Chairman of Military and Commercial Shipbuilder, Dies
